name: filter_cook_time_in_minutes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool keto_diet.
Tool description: Dataset of over 450 Ketogenic diet recipes in over 10 categories from Breakfast to Dinner.  Check out encurate.app to manage content on your mobile apps. Contact to feature your app on encurate.app website.
API description: Gives keto recipes within given range of cooking time.
cook_time_in_minutes__lt = Less than
cook_time_in_minutes__gt = Greater than

cook_time_in_minutes_tg.description: Minimum cooking time in minutes (greater than or equal to this value).

cook_time_in_minutes_lt.description: Maximum cooking time in minutes (less than this value).
